name: Vietnam Reels RAG - Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'if [ ! -f .env ] && [ -f .env.example ]; then cp .env.example .env; fi; python3 -m pip install -U pip >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip3 install -r requirements.txt || true; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'echo Dev container ready. Use: docker compose up -d'
